AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Homesteader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia homesteader. She is conscripted by local warlords.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Youth
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia youth, pursuing excitement and glory in the war.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Army Reserve
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia army reserve. She has the skills to survive this war.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Officer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia officer. Everyone in her family serves in the army.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Laborer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia laborer of an oil company.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Art Student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia art student. She was admitted by a local art academy, but the war ruined everything.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Veteran
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia veteran. She joins the army again because she has not received pension for months.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Special Force
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of Jurnizia special force. She has excellent combat skills, but also some dark secrets.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Warlord
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia warlord. She owns everything, and therefore becomes paranoid that others will take her belongings away.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Jurnizia Spokesperson
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Jurnizia spokesperson. Her job is to declare victory and deny defeats.
